lis=['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','q','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z']
a=raw_input().strip()
leng=len(a)
count=0
if(leng%2==1):
	count+=1
flag=1
for i in lis:
	k=a.count(i)
	if(k%2==1):
		if(count>0):
			count-=1
		else:
			flag=0
			break
if(flag==1):
	print "YES"
else:
	print "NO"
